title: Library protocol
description: Schema for submitting a standard protocol used to generate a molecular library.

name.title: Name
name.description: The unique idenfier that describes the protocol used to create the library, convention is lower cased and hyphen delimited.

title.title: Title
title.description: The unique name that describes the protocol used to create the library, convention is the name with common use of uppercase and spaces.

construction_platform.title: Platform
construction_platform.description: The device used to construct the library.
construction_platform.comment: Use in cases of automated/proprietary library preparation (Fluidigm, 10x, etc.)

construction_platform_version.title: Platform version
construction_platform_version.description: The version of the device used to construct the library.

library_type.title: Library type
library_type.description: The category of assay used in library construction, correlating with the biological material being profiled.

biological_macromolecule.title: Library material
biological_macromolecule.description: The molecule isolated to generate the library (e.g. 'RNA' for a total RNA library, even if that library is subsequently reverse transcribed for DNA sequencing.)

extraction_method.title: Extraction method
extraction_method.description: A short description or reference of the nucleic acid extraction protocol used in library preparation, if applicable.

fragmentation_method.title: Fragmentation method
fragmentation_method.description: A list of nucleic acid fragmentation methods and restriction enzymes used in library preparation.

library_size_selection_method.title: Size selection method
library_size_selection_method.description: A short description or reference of the size selection protocol used in library preparation, if applicable.

lysis_method.title: Lysis method
lysis_method.description: A short description or reference of the cell lysis protocol used in library preparation, if applicable.

size_range.title: Size range
size_range.description: The targeted size range of the purified nucleic acid (eg: 400-1000 or >500).

strand_specificity.title: Strand specificity
strand_specificity.description: The forward or reverse strandedness of the library resulting from a strand-specific protocol.

depleted_in_term_name.title: Depleted in term name
depleted_in_term_name.description: SO (Sequence Ontology) term best matching the nucleic acid that was diminished from the library.

depleted_in_term_id.title: Depleted in term ID
depleted_in_term_id.description: The SO (Sequence Ontology) term ID best matching the nucleic acid that was diminished from the library.

end_bias.title: End bias
end_bias.description: The end of the RNA molecule that was primed and sequenced for library creation, or else 'full length' if the entire molecule was fragmented and sequenced.

library_preparation_environment.title: Library preparation environment
library_preparation_environment.description: The mechanical design and infrastructure of the assay used in library creation.

polyA_selection.title: PolyA selection
polyA_selection.description: A flag to indicate whether or not there was step in the experimental protocol to select for polyA in the mRNA.

polyA_selection_method.title: polyA selection method
polyA_selection_method.description: The method in the experimental protocol used to select for the polyA in mRNA.

cell_barcode_whitelist.title: Cell barcode whitelist
cell_barcode_whitelist.description: The file containing the list of legitimate cell barcode sequences.

read_structure.title: Read structure
read_structure.description: A list of elements in the read describing the structure of a read.

items.title: Sequence element
items.description: One element in the read with start and end coordinates.

start.title: Start coordinate
start.description: The 1-based start coordinate within the read. A negative number stands for a position counting from the end of the read.

end.title: End coordinate
end.description: The 1-based end coordinate within the read. A negative number stands for a position counting from the end of the read.

library_amplification_method.title: Library amplification method
library_amplification_method.description: The method used to amplify the library prior to sequencing, this would be the cDNA for RNA-seq and DNA for others.

library_preamplification_method.title: Library preamplification method
library_preamplification_method.description: The method used to generate the library prior to amplification.

first_strand_primer.title: First strand primer
first_strand_primer.description: The primer used to create the first-strand in library synthesis.

second_strand_primer.title: Second strand primer
second_strand_primer.description: The primer used to create the second-strand in library synthesis.
